package.name: asr_resources_for_vision
package.description: This package holds bits and pieces that are related to the acquisition of color and depth-image data streams with robot heads. Currently, it contains a hierarchy of launch scripts to start up simultaneous data acquisition from complex setups of vision sensors as encountered on robot heads (e.g. RGB-D in combination with a color camera or a stereo camera setup).
package.author: Heizmann Heinrich, Meißner Pascal
